seo.title: Corniglia Beaches 2025 | Swimming & Beach Access
seo.description: Beach access from Corniglia. The only Cinque Terre village without direct beach, but nearby options in Vernazza and Manarola for swimming.

body.title: Beach Access from Corniglia
body.subtitle: Corniglia is the only village without direct beach access. Nearby options require a short train ride or hike.

features.title: Vernazza Beach
features.description: 5 minutes by train. Small sandy beach in charming harbor. Most convenient option from Corniglia.

features.title: Manarola Rocks
features.description: 8 minutes by train. Flat rock platforms for sunbathing and swimming. Crystal clear water.

features.title: Guvano Beach
features.description: Historic nude beach below Corniglia. Currently closed - check local status. Accessible via tunnel when open.

features.title: Monterosso Beach
features.description: 15 minutes by train. Largest sandy beach in Cinque Terre. Beach clubs and amenities.

features.title: Boat Tours
features.description: Discover hidden coves and swimming spots accessible only by boat. Tours depart from Monterosso.

features.title: Enjoy the Views
features.description: Corniglia's elevated position offers the best panoramic views. Trade beach access for spectacular scenery.
